monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Allows the Monster to equip an additional accessory.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Allows the Monster to equip two weapons. Second weapon values are reduced by 50%.

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Blinding Sparks
skills.description: Unique Aura: There is a chance to apply Blind to enemies when they take Burn damage (40%) or Shock damage (20%).

skills.name: Blinding Sunlight
skills.description: Every Fire and every Wind hit has a 20% chance to apply a stack of Blind. (Stacks don't count as Debuffs)

skills.name: Buffing Shield
skills.description: When applying a Buff, also apply a Shield equal to 30% of this Monster's Defense.

skills.name: Burning Heat
skills.description: Every Fire attack hit has a 15% chance to apply Burn.

skills.name: Chain Reaction
skills.description: When attacking a single target, trigger Shock (Debuff) Damage on all enemies.

skills.name: Cleanse
skills.description: Every hit has a 25% chance to remove a Buff from the target.

skills.name: Crit Chance Focus
skills.description: Critical Chance values from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Crit Damage Plus
skills.description: +15% Critical Damage

skills.name: Critical Hybridization
skills.description: The first critical hit of a physical attack triggers an additional hit equal to 60% of Magic value and vice versa.

skills.name: Defense Focus
skills.description: Defense from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 37)

skills.name: Defense Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 50% of Defense value.

skills.name: Dual Wield
skills.description: Allows the Monster to equip two weapons. Second weapon values are reduced by 50%.

skills.name: Electric Field
skills.description: When this Monster gets attacked, 50% chance to apply Shock on the attacker.

skills.name: Electrocute
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) magical damage (wind) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Shock (Debuff).

skills.name: Equipment Mastery
skills.description: Allows the Monster to equip an additional accessory.

skills.name: Exposed
skills.description: Aura: Your Monsters deal 15% more damage when attacking an enemy with Blind stacks.

skills.name: Fiery Stabs
skills.description: 4 x 35% (140%) physical damage (fire) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Fiery Stabs Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 50% (200%) physical damage (fire) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Fiery Stabs Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 50% (250%) physical damage (fire) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Fiery Stabs Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 65% (325%) physical damage (fire) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Fiery Stabs Lvl 5
skills.description: 5 x 85% (425%) physical damage (fire) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Full Defense
skills.description: Applies Barrier, Agility & Spellshield (Buffs)

skills.name: Full Defense Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Barrier, Agility, Spellshield & Regeneration (Buffs)

skills.name: Full Defense Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Barrier, Agility, Spellshield, Regeneration & Channel (Buffs)

skills.name: Full Restore
skills.description: Heal target for 4 x (200 + 30% Magic) Shield target for 4 x (200 + 30% Defense) Removes 6 Debuffs

skills.name: Glare
skills.description: When this Monster gets attacked, apply a stack of Blind on the attacker.

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Helping Hand
skills.description: Heal target for 5 x (110 + 50% Magic) Applies Sidekick (Buff)

skills.name: Helping Hand Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal target for 5 x (150 + 55% Magic) Applies Sidekick & Regeneration (Buffs)

skills.name: Hybrid Mastery
skills.description: Increases Attack by 10% of this Monster's Magic and increases Magic by 10% of this Monster's Attack.

skills.name: Impactful Shock
skills.description: Unique Aura: Shock hits have a 40% increased Critical Chance and do 10% increased base damage.

skills.name: Lightning Bolt
skills.description: 3 x 60% (180%) magical damage (wind)

skills.name: Lightning Bolt Lvl 2
skills.description: 3 x 80% (240%) magical damage (wind)

skills.name: Lightning Bolt Lvl 3
skills.description: 4 x 70% (280%) magical damage (wind)

skills.name: Lightning Bolt Lvl 4
skills.description: 4 x 90% (360%) magical damage (wind)

skills.name: Lightning Bolt Lvl 5
skills.description: 5 x 95% (475%) magical damage (wind)

skills.name: Lightning Slash
skills.description: 2 x 85% (170%) physical damage (wind) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Lightning Slash Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 115% (230%) physical damage (wind) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Lightning Slash Lvl 3
skills.description: 3 x 95% (285%) physical damage (wind) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Lightning Slash Lvl 4
skills.description: 3 x 120% (360%) physical damage (wind) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Lightning Slash Lvl 5
skills.description: 4 x 110% (440%) physical damage (wind) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Mana Generator
skills.description: Regenerate 4 Mana for every hit this Monster receives.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 11)

skills.name: Mass Protector
skills.description: Aura: All Monsters in the party receive 15% less damage from Multi-Target-Attacks.

skills.name: Mentor
skills.description: Whenever this Monster uses a single-target skill on an ally, they gain 2 random Buffs.

skills.name: Multi Shock
skills.description: Aura: Shock (Debuff) can be stacked two additional times on enemies. Additional stacks have only a 50% chance to trigger.

skills.name: Protect
skills.description: Redirects the next attack on target ally to this Monster. Shield self for 3 x (80 + 25% Defense)

skills.name: Protect Lvl 2
skills.description: Redirects the next attack on target ally to this Monster. Shield self for 4 x (80 + 25% Defense)

skills.name: Protect Lvl 3
skills.description: Redirects the next attack on target ally to this Monster. Shield self for 5 x (90 + 20% Defense)

skills.name: Protect Lvl 4
skills.description: Redirects the next attack on target ally to this Monster. Shield self for 6 x (100 + 20% Defense)

skills.name: Protect Lvl 5
skills.description: Redirects the next attack on target ally to this Monster. Shield self for 7 x (130 + 20% Defense)

skills.name: Protector
skills.description: Aura: All Monsters in the party receive 7.5% less damage.

skills.name: Shield Aura
skills.description: Aura: All Shield effects of Monsters in the party are increased by 10%.

skills.name: Shocking Current
skills.description: Every Wind attack hit has a 15% chance to apply Shock.

skills.name: Solar Blaze
skills.description: 3 x 95% (285%) magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies Applies Sorcery (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Solar Rays
skills.description: 3 x 65% (195%) magical damage (fire)

skills.name: Solar Rays Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 60% (240%) magical damage (fire)

skills.name: Solar Rays Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 60% (300%) magical damage (fire)

skills.name: Solar Rays Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 75% (375%) magical damage (fire)

skills.name: Solar Rays Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 80% (480%) magical damage (fire)

skills.name: Thunder Strike
skills.description: 1 x 370% magical damage (wind) Deals additional 3 x 20% (60%)  damage if the target has Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Thunder Strike Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 460% magical damage (wind) Deals additional 4 x 20% (80%)  damage if the target has Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Water Weakness
skills.description: Water damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Weaponry
skills.description: Aura: Increases the stats gained from weapons by 25% for allied Warrior Monsters.

skills.name: Wind Resistance
skills.description: Wind damage reduced by 50%

drops.name: Level Badge
drops.description: Increases Monster level by 1. Can be used on monsters that are at least 2 levels below your highest monster.

drops.name: Reward Box lvl 1
drops.description: Consume to get a random item.
